DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore efficacy safety SUN13834 v placebo adult subject atopic dermatitis
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Randomized , Placebo-Controlled , Double-Blind Study SUN13834 Adult Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 65 year age ( inclusive ) . A diagnosis AD , meet Guidelines Diagnosis Atopic Dermatitis criterion Taking systemic immunosuppressive drug biologicals ( within 3 month ) , systemic corticosteroid therapy ( within 4 week ) prior Screening ( note : inhale , intranasal otic corticosteroid allow ) . Use phototherapy tan bed within 6 week screen History reactive airway disease ( asthma ) require hospitalization intensive care unit last 5 year . Presence clinically significant disorder involve cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal , immunologic , hematologic , endocrine , neurologic system ( ) psychiatric disease ( determined Clinical Investigator ) interfere interpretation data patient ( eg , renal impairment nonatopic pruritis ) .
